title: Francisco de Goya y Lucientes, Pintor (Francisco de Goya y Lucientes, Painter)
medium: etching, aquatint, drypoint and burin on paper (in bound volume)
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Rosenbloom
provenance_text:
small circular bookplate "Rouart Alexis" glued to front endpaper; Paris customs stamp on binding; Alexis Hubert Rouart (1839-1911), Paris (Lugt suppl. 2187a)

Probably Charles Sessler, Philadelphia, PA; probably sold to Charles Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA on November 13, 1936 for $1155 (invoice 100976); Charles Rosenbloom], Pittsburgh, PA until April 1, 1973; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

This and all 57.23 entries under review by CGK.
